summary: The story of the history-making Nottingham Forest team that won back-to-back European Cups in 1979 and 1980, led by the mercurial Brian Clough and his assistant Peter Taylor.
cast: Brian Clough|Peter Taylor|Jimmy Gordon|John McGovern|Peter Shilton|Viv Anderson|Colin Barrett|Larry Lloyd|Frank Clark|Trevor Francis|John O'Hare|Archie Gemmill|Kenny Burns|Martin O'Neill|Ian Bowyer|Tony Woodcock|David Needham|John Robertson|Garry Birtles|Peter Withe|Chris Woods|Frank Gray|Gary Mills|Bryn Gunn|Muhammad Ali|Adrian Chiles|Nottingham Forest F.C.|Austin Mitchell|Michael Parkinson
keywords: english football|professional soccer player|soccer coach|soccer documentary|british soccer
title: I Believe in Miracles
